channel.title: Torva Full Helm help (Delta 317)
channel.description: I need help coding my Torva Full helm, for some reason even though I've tried adding it to "Helm" and "Full Helm" in Item.java, my Torva Full Helm still appears as a weapon, and it also appears as a Platebody, now at first I considered that I might have it grabbing the wrong model from the models folder, but than I realized that once I dropped it, it looks like the Torva full helm on the ground, so now I know it's taking the correct model. Any help? Please? I'm thoroughly stumped.

item.title: Torva Full Helm help (Delta 317)
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

try hat mask ect, all the ones worn on the head

Read full topic

item.title: Torva Full Helm help (Delta 317)
item.dc:creator: @z_0_m_g_str z 0 m g str
item.description:
@z_0_m_g_str wrote:

I need help coding my Torva Full helm, for some reason even though I’ve tried adding it to “Helm” and “Full Helm” in Item.java, my Torva Full Helm still appears as a weapon, and it also appears as a Platebody, now at first I considered that I might have it grabbing the wrong model from the models folder, but than I realized that once I dropped it, it looks like the Torva full helm on the ground, so now I know it’s taking the correct model. Any help? Please? I’m thoroughly stumped.

Read full topic
